PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The shapes of the EQE curves of the devices in the range of 450-700 nm could be assigned to the stronger absorption of PC 70 BM .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| EQE curves |
| devices |
| range of 450-700 nm |
| stronger absorption |
| PC 70 BM |

The paragraph mentions several properties related to the discussion of the devices' EQE (External Quantum Efficiency) curves in a certain wavelength range. These properties are:

1. EQE curves: The external quantum efficiency curves of the devices.
2. Devices: The objects being discussed, which are the devices with EQE curves.
3. Range of 450-700 nm: The specific wavelength range for the EQE curves.
4. Stronger absorption: The property of PC 70 BM that leads to the shapes of the EQE curves.
5. PC 70 BM: A material or substance with stronger absorption in the mentioned wavelength range.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| stronger absorption |

After re-evaluating the paragraph, only one property can be clearly identified as a material property:

1. Stronger absorption: The property of PC 7
